head.title: Documentation
head.keywords: livestock, open source, NAIS, XML, Eclipse, RFID, herd management

section.title: Issues Tracking Report
section.para:
Milestone3 issues report generated from the Trac
Trac is the issues tracking tool used to track defects, enhancements and tasks for the Tracker, other than that there is no relationship to Tracker.
This system is NOT Internet accessible at this time, so a report will have to serve.
issues tracking system.

section.title: User Guide
section.para: Installation, Customization and Usage Guide. The trackerUserGuide.pdf is an extensive reference for installing, using and customizing the Tracker software.
